mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_CD, A.ACCOUNT, A.PASSWORD, A.USER_NM, A.PHONE, A.USER_EMAIL, A.USER_ADDR, A.USER_ADDR_DETAIL, A.USER_LV, A.REG_DATE, A.MDF_DATE, A.REG_USER_CD, A.MDF_USER_CD, A.CPN_CD, B.USER_NM AS REG_USER_NM, C.USER_NM AS MDF_USER_NM, D.LEVEL_EXP FROM K7_USER_ACCOUNT_OMS A LEFT OUTER JOIN K7_USER_ACCOUNT_OMS B ON (A.REG_USER_CD = B.USER_CD ) LEFT OUTER JOIN K7_USER_ACCOUNT_OMS C ON (A.MDF_USER_CD = C.USER_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN K7_USER_AUTH_OMS D ON (D.USER_LV = A.USER_LV) WHERE A.USER_CD = #{user_cd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO K7_USER_ACCOUNT_OMS ( USER_CD, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, USER_NM, USER_LV, CPN_CD, PHONE, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDR, USER_ADDR_DETAIL, REG_USER_CD, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( K7_OMS_SEQ_USER_CD.nextval, #{ACCOUNT}, #{PASSWORD}, #{USER_NM}, #{USER_LV}, #{CPN_CD}, REPLACE(#{PHONE}, '-', ''), #{USER_EMAIL}, #{USER_ADDR}, #{USER_ADDR_DETAIL}, #{REG_USER_CD}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE K7_USER_ACCOUNT_OMS SET ACCOUNT = #{ACCOUNT}, PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD}, USER_NM = #{USER_NM}, PHONE = REPLACE(#{PHONE},'-', ''), USER_EMAIL = #{USER_EMAIL}, USER_LV = #{USER_LV}, CPN_CD = #{CPN_CD}, USER_ADDR = #{USER_ADDR}, USER_ADDR_DETAIL = #{USER_ADDR_DETAIL}, MDF_USER_CD = #{MDF_USER_CD}, MDF_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_CD = #{USER_CD}
